hero.title: Discover the NCI Data Sharing Lifecycle
hero.subtitle: NCI's Data Sharing Approach Starts and Ends with the Patient in Mind

mission.title: NCI Office of Data Sharing (ODS) Mission:
mission.description: To direct a comprehensive data sharing vision and strategy for NCI which advocates for proper broad and equitable data sharing and the needs of the cancer research and patient communities.

banner.supportTitle: NCI ODS Supports Broad Data Sharing in 3 Ways
banner.questionText: Have a question about how to share your NCI-funded research?
textFrame: Advise on programs that define impactful data and resources
Offer tools and processes that help ensure data are Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable (FAIR).
Implement guidance that promotes broad access and use of data

updates.title: HHS ASTP HTI-5 Rule Open for Public Comment Until 2/27
updates.description: New proposal to streamline IT certification, expand health data access, and support AI-ready data.

updates.title: ODS Data Jamboree Seminar Series: Tue 2/24 11AM - 1PM EST
updates.description: Join us to hear Data Jamboree teams share findings on pediatric/AYA cancer data tools.

updates.title: Basic Experimental Studies in Humans (BESH) Will No Longer Be Considered Clinical Trials by the NIH
